sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MultiAuthUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>A utility script include contain functions related to authentication</description>
        <name>MultiAuthUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var MultiAuthUtils = Class.create();

MultiAuthUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    generateTOTP: function(key, length) {
        if (!length) {
            gs.info("Setting the token length to default value {0}.", 6);
            length = 6;
        }

        if (length < 6 || length > 9) {
            gs.info("Invalid token length {0} is passed.", length);
            return 'Invalid Token Length';
        }

        return SNC.MultifactorAuthUtil.generateOTPFor(key, length);
    },

    type: 'MultiAuthUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-23 12:39:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>32557f24776111107cb28babbe5a9950</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MultiAuthUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multifactor Authentication" source="com.snc.integration.multifactor.authentication">5b99f4e43cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_32557f24776111107cb28babbe5a9950</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-18 11:50:25</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
